Position: Assistant Professor of Plant Pathology -Virology. The Agricultural University of Athens is a public entity conducting basic and applied research in the field of agricultural sciences. The entity has no official responsibilities for risk management (see http://www.aua.gr/index.php & http://efp.aua.gr/en).
